function_reachability: Is it impossible for function 'fread' to reach function 'fopen'?

loop_reachability: Is it possible that the loop with condition 'i < n-1' is never executed?

Is the loop with condition 'i < count' always executed?
dominators: Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'i < n-1' without passing through its header block?
Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'i < count' without passing through its header block?
data_dependency: Is variable 'argc (line 2)' used after its definition?
Is variable 'argv (line 2)' used after its definition?
liveness: Does variable 'argc' remain in use at the end of function 'main'?
Does variable 'i' remain in use at the end of function 'main'?
dead_code: Can the statement 'if(i%10 == 9)' be considered dead code?
